amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 116-457 to clarify and extend sanctions related to the construction of the Nord Stream II pipeline.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 116-457 to clarify and extend sanctions related to the construction of the Nord Stream II pipeline.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A011) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Gallego.
